Uses of Interface
java.io.DataInput

  • Packages that use DataInput 
    Package Description
    java.io
    Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
    javax.microedition.io
    Provides a simplified mechanism for applications to use various types of I/O protocols in resource-constrained environments.

    • Uses of DataInput in java.io

      Subinterfaces of DataInput in java.io 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ObjectInput
      ObjectInput extends the DataInput interface to include the reading of objects.
      Classes in java.io that implement DataInput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataInputStream
      A data input stream lets an application read primitive Java data types from an underlying input stream in a machine-independent way.
      class  ObjectInputStream
      An ObjectInputStream deserializes primitive data and objects previously written using an ObjectOutputStream.
      class  RandomAccessFile
      Instances of this class support both reading and writing to a random access file.
      Methods in java.io with parameters of type DataInput 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String DataInputStream.readUTF(DataInput in)
      Reads from the stream in a representation of a Unicode character string encoded in Java modified UTF-8 format; this string of characters is then returned as a String.

    • Uses of DataInput in javax.microedition.io

      Subinterfaces of DataInput in javax.microedition.io 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Datagram
      This class defines an abstract interface for datagram packets.
